wikipedia_page.main: Kevin Michael Hughes (born 30 April 1973) is a British former athlete. He competed in the men's pole vault at the 2000 Summer Olympics. He represented England in the pole vault event, at the 1998 Commonwealth Games in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Four years later he represented England again in the pole vault at the 2002 Commonwealth Games.
